General.Name: Man Zai Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Man Zai Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells air-conditioner components for vehicles worldwide. The company offers auto air-con modules, including condenser units, evaporator units, and heater cores; automobile and motorcycle aluminum radiators for cooling systems, such as radiator units and oil coolers; and thermal-electric cooling modules comprising thermal modules for CPU, thermal syphon modules, and liquid cooling modules, as well as water-cooled modules for use in CPU, VGA, LED, and auto-electric cooling modules. It also provides aluminum extrusion products that include fittings/brackets/pipes, racket frames, OPC drums, computer heat sinks, and bicycle frames; and air-con and refrigeration products. Man Zai Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.260, Zhongshan Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 718
